meanings.definition: Inclined to take risks or embark on daring adventures.
meanings.sent1: The venturesome explorer set out to discover new lands.
meanings.sent2: She admired his venturesome spirit when he decided to climb the mountain.
meanings.sent3: The venturesome squirrel tried to reach the bird feeder by walking on the thin branch.
meanings.sent4: Her venturesome decision to start her own business paid off in the end.
meanings.sent5: The venturesome knight bravely faced the dragon to save the princess.

meanings.definition: Bold or daring in a way that may involve risk or danger.
meanings.sent1: The venturesome child climbed the tree without any fear.
meanings.sent2: The group of friends embarked on a venturesome journey through the dense forest.
meanings.sent3: The venturesome cat leaped from the roof to catch a butterfly.
meanings.sent4: His venturesome plan to cross the river on a makeshift raft was successful.
meanings.sent5: The venturesome acrobat amazed the audience with her daring stunts.
